entry.string: Add link for Open in new window
Height of viewing window in pixels
Width of viewing window in pixels or percent
The Window module is a port of the popular PostWrap module (for PostNuke) to Xaraya. It lets you display standalone external web pages from within your Xaraya site.
There are two administration pages, one for general and one for URL specific settings.
General settings are valid for all URLs.
You can also define specific settings for different pages.
URL specific settings, such as the dimensions of the display, will override the general settings.
To display an external page, create an entry for it in the user menu. (See the Blocks module for information on how to do this.) In the URL field of the menu entry write the following:
Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
